title: Technical Business Analyst
description:
Role title: Business Analyst (Data Analytics)




Role purpose:




Working for the Business Intelligence area requires a good understanding of the business context and the business requirements.
A business analyst is an extremely critical role that plays the role of pivot between business and solutions provided to the business to help them take critical decisions.
He/she should have experience in requirements engineering, specifically the challenge and validation of data capability and reporting requirements.
He/she should have experience in telecom environment, with exposure to Strategic/analytics roles.




Core competencies, knowledge, and experience :

Essential:

Good in requirement elicitation
Good telecom knowledge
Good technical knowledge
Good communication.
Able to manage priorities and stakeholders.

Experience:

This position requires strong knowledge on BI and Data Warehousing and working knowledge on databases like Teradata/Oracle.
Strong exposure to data analysis, gap analysis, data profiling, clearly documenting requirements, good knowledge on Business Analysis life cycle with very strong and clear communication skills.
Candidate should have experience in Agile Projects preferably in SAFe methodology.




Must have technical / professional qualifications:




Good experiences in:

Experienced in requirements engineering, specifically the challenge and validation of data capability and reporting requirements.
Knowledge on basics of DWH and exposure to BI projects
Basics of RDBMS with knowledge of SQL.
SQL, especially Teradata, Wherescape and ETL tool
Experienced in requirements analysis, specifically the challenge and validation of data capability and reporting requirements.
